description:
Chi-chan, Uc-chan, and Joe-kun form a team to repay Yuka`s kindness together! They use the PriPri Shot to try to make Yuka happy. Can they succeed in repaying their debt to Yuka?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bumblers! Gotta Do Lots to Repay Yuka!
Heppoko! Yuuka ni Ippai Ongaeshi Dechi!
へっぽこ! ゆーかにいっぱい恩返しでち!
